item.title: Title: "Bass Quake in the Ritual Pit: Brad Stewart of Saliva Spits 'Desperation' at Ex-Frontman Josey Scott!"
item.description:
Description: Riff Warriors, grab your caffeinated brew, 'cause shit's hitting the amplifier.
Our latest drama-infused sonic bloodbath is served! Stand witness as Saliva's bass quake master, Brad Stewart, fires off a neck-snapping rekt riff at the band's former frontman, Josey Scott. Calling him 'desperate' after a few choice comments, the pit got real heated, real quick!
When it comes to in-band squabbles, watching from the sidelines with your favorite brew in hand is a rite of passage for we, the Broken-Neck Brigade. So let the feedback ring, the drama unfold and remember, while the world burns, we shred!
Read more about this fretboard massacre [here](https://www.metalsucks.net/2025/08/24/saliva-bassist-brad-stewart-calls-ex-frontman-josey-scott-desperate-after-recent-comments/). MetalSucks, the source of chaos, keeping the Denim & Despair Club in the know.
*Chaos is music's favorite key. Remember that, moshpit meat grinders.*
